verses.plain: From whence come wars and fightings among you? come they not hence, even of your lusts that war in your members?

tokens.t: From whence
wars and fightings among you?
not hence,
of your lusts that war in your members?

verses.plain: Ye lust, and have not: ye kill, and desire to have, and cannot obtain: ye fight and war, yet ye have not, because ye ask not.

tokens.t: Ye lust, and have not: ye kill, and desire to have, and cannot obtain: ye fight and war, yet ye have not, because ye ask not.

verses.plain: Ye ask, and receive not, because ye ask amiss, that ye may consume it upon your lusts.

tokens.t: Ye ask, and receive not, because ye ask amiss, that ye may consume
upon your lusts.

verses.plain: Ye adulterers and adulteresses, know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.

tokens.t: Ye adulterers and adulteresses, know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.

verses.plain: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain, The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy?

tokens.t: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain, The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy?

verses.plain: But he giveth more grace. Wherefore he saith, God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble.

tokens.t: But he giveth more grace. Wherefore he saith, God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble.

verses.plain: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

tokens.t: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

verses.plain: Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.

tokens.t: Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse
hands,
sinners; and purify
hearts,
double minded.

verses.plain: Be afflicted, and mourn, and weep: let your laughter be turned to mourning, and your joy to heaviness.

tokens.t: Be afflicted, and mourn, and weep: let your laughter be turned to mourning, and
joy to heaviness.

verses.plain: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he shall lift you up.

tokens.t: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he shall lift you up.

verses.plain: Speak not evil one of another, brethren. He that speaketh evil of his brother, and judgeth his brother, speaketh evil of the law, and judgeth the law: but if thou judge the law, thou art not a doer of the law, but a judge.

tokens.t: Speak not evil one of another, brethren. He that speaketh evil of
brother, and judgeth his brother, speaketh evil of the law, and judgeth the law: but if thou judge the law, thou art not a doer of the law, but a judge.

verses.plain: There is one lawgiver, who is able to save and to destroy: who art thou that judgest another?

tokens.t: There is one lawgiver, who is able to save and to destroy: who art thou that judgest another?

verses.plain: Go to now, ye that say, To day or to morrow we will go into such a city, and continue there a year, and buy and sell, and get gain:

tokens.t: Go to now, ye that say, To day or to morrow we will go into such a city, and continue there a year, and buy and sell, and get gain:

verses.plain: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow. For what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.

tokens.t: Whereas ye know not what
on the morrow. For what
your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.

verses.plain: For that ye ought to say, If the Lord will, we shall live, and do this, or that.

tokens.t: For that ye
to say, If the Lord will, we shall live, and do this, or that.

verses.plain: But now ye rejoice in your boastings: all such rejoicing is evil.

tokens.t: But now ye rejoice in your boastings: all such rejoicing is evil.

verses.plain: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good, and doeth it not, to him it is sin.

tokens.t: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good, and doeth
not, to him it is sin.
